data.title: Fans Are Rejoicing After Noticing A Very Relatable Trait On Lais Ribeiro
data.meta_description: Fans noticed that Victoria's Secret angel Lais Ribeiro has stretch marks and the internet is loving it.
data.text:
It’s easy to get caught up in the hype of the Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show. Tall, lithe, beautiful women parading around in expensive, colourful, often crystal-embellished underwear, certainly seems to garner people’s attention.

Though, throughout it all, it can be difficult to imagine the models as relatable in any way. Their incredibly toned figures, smooth skin and perfectly curled tresses feel seemingly unobtainable to us mere mortals, however one fan has just noticed a trait on Lais Ribeiro that we’re sure most women can relate to.

As reported by Yahoo7 and Refinery29, an eagle-eyed fan spotted a few tiny stretch marks on Lais Ribeiro’s thigh, and the internet is rejoicing.

Given that we are so used to seeing overly photoshopped, and often unachievable standards of beauty, it’s refreshing to know that even the world’s most successful supermodels have stretch marks, just like the average woman.

As one commenter so eloquently put it, “I truly think that every natural mark or scar tells a story and makes human body even more beautiful and interesting!”

Another fan took to Twitter to say, “Lais Ribeiro has stretch marks and y’all have no idea how good it makes me feel about mine.”

Here’s to body positivity and accepting ourselves just the way we are.
